Mercurial_Blow.display_help: You strike your foe with a lightning fast blow, dealing smashing damage and reducing the target's defense.
Mercurial_Blow.display_target_help: Your defense against all types of damage has been reduced.

Mastery_of_Form.display_help: You are a living staff whose mastery of form is unique. You are able to boost your damage and chance to hit regularly.

Serpents_Reach.display_help: You release a burst of energy, causing smashing damage to a distant target. This burst of energy has a good chance of knocking your target to the ground.
Serpents_Reach.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Smashing), Chance for Knockdown

Innocuous_Strikes.display_help: You batter your foes' feet and legs with a flurry of blows. This deals smashing damage to all enemies within a cone before you. This attack will also reduce your opponents' movement speed, with a chance of immobilizing them completely.
Innocuous_Strikes.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DoT(Smashing), -Speed(Foe, All), Chance for Immobilize (Foe)
Innocuous_Strikes.display_target_help: Your movement speeds have been reduced and you may be immobilized.

Sky_Splitter.display_help: You bash your opponent with a powerful overhead strike. This attack causes significant smashing damage and will knock your target off their feet. In extreme cases, your opponent will also be stunned. You will gain a buff to regeneration, recovery, damage and chance to hit.
Sky_Splitter.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Smashing), +RES(Self, All), +Regen(Self, All), +Rec(Self, All), +ToHit(Self), Knockdown(Foe), Chance to Stun(Foe)

Heal_Other.display_help: With a surge of positive energy, you heal a single target.

Blind.display_help: You create a brilliant flash which temporarily blinds your opponents, causing energy damage and freezing them in place. There is a chance that this flash will also briefly blind other opponents near to the main target.
Blind.display_target_help: You are held in place and unable to move.

Absorb_Pain.display_help: You unleash a burst of light which dramatically heals the wounds of a nearby entity. This entity may be friend or foe. The power of the heal dims you slightly, causing you damage and preventing any healing or regeneration on yourself for a while.
Absorb_Pain.display_short_help: PBAoE (Single Target), Heal (Any), Moderate DMG (Self), -Regen(Self), +RES(Self, Heal)

Ice_Blast.display_help: You hurl large shards of ice at your opponents. These cause smashing damage on striking the target before chilling them, which causes cold damage and reduces both attack and movement speeds for a time.
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your attack and movement speeds have been reduced.

Freeze_Ray.display_help: You fire a lance of supercooled ice at your target that causes the target to freeze upon impact. The affected target suffers cold damage and is held in place, unable to move.
Freeze_Ray.display_target_help: You are held in place and unable to move.

Ice_Storm.display_help: You create an ice storm around one of your opponents. This storm deals a constant stream of damage over a large area and can slow the movement of all opponents caught in its radius.
Ice_Storm.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Minor DoT(Cold, Lethal), -Rech(Foe), -Speed(Foe, All)
Ice_Storm.display_target_help: You are suffering cold damage over time and both your attack and movement speeds have been reduced.

Scream.display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening their resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Scream.display_target_help: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your Damage Resistance has been reduced.

Howl.display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: Medium, Recharge: Slow
Howl.display_target_help: The Howl has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Shout.display_help: You blast your foe with a tremendous Shout, damaging them and reducing their Damage Resistance. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Shout.display_target_help: The sonic Shout has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Sonic_Barrier.display_help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Smashing, Lethal, and Toxic attacks for a limited time. You cannot stack multiple Sonic Barriers on the same target; however, the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Haven. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Sonic_Barrier.display_target_help: The Sonic Barrier has increased your resistances to Smashing, Lethal and Toxic damage.
Sonic_Barrier.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from physical attacks with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Barrier.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.

Sonic_Dispersion.display_help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The Sonic Dispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Dispersion.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All Damage except Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.display_target_help: The Sonic Bubble is granting you Resistance to all types of damage as well as Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting effects.
Sonic_Dispersion.display_target_short_help: +Res(All Damage but Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from most damage types with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Dispersion.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with {PowerName}.

Blessing_of_Rejuvenation.display_help: The Counter Spell's Blessing of Rejuvenation constantly heals nearby allies.
Blessing_of_Rejuvenation.display_target_help: The Counter Spell's Blessing of Rejuvenation constantly heals nearby allies.

Temporal_Mending.display_help: You mend the wounds of yourself and nearby allies by placing your bodies in a past or future state where they are far less injured, immediately healing them and continuing to do so for several seconds. Allies are also resistant to attack and movement speed debuffs for a short time.

Times_Juncture.display_help: You create a time dilation field around you causing enemies who get too close to be slowed to a crawl. Affected targets will see their movement speed, damage and chance to hit decreased substantially. Enemies affected by Delayed have these affects increased.
Times_Juncture.display_target_help: You are suffering from reduced damage potential, movement speed and chance to hit.

Farsight.display_help: You give your allies a brief glimpse into the future, providing them an increase in their perception, chance to hit and defenses.

Crush.display_help: You create a gravity well around a single target. This crushing well causes continual smashing damage and immobilizes the target. Flying targets are also brought to the ground.
Crush.display_target_help: You are immobilized and suffering smashing damage over time. Your movement speed and ability to fly are also inhibited.

Lift.display_help: You negate the force of gravity around your target, violently sending them into the air. This causes smashing damage when they fall to the ground.
Lift.display_target_help: You are unable to fly for a short time.

Spectral_Wounds.display_help: You create spectral wounds on your target, which struggles with its grip on reality. This causes psionic damage and prevents the target from fleeing briefly, though some of this damage is not real and will be undone within a few seconds if the target survives.
Spectral_Wounds.display_target_help: You are suffering from spectral wounds and are unable to run away.

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Explosive_Blast.display_help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. Explosive Blast may knock targets backwards. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Explosive_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Energy Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Energy_Drain.display_help: Energy Drain leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance and Hit Points. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance. Recharge: Long

Siphon_Power.display_help: You can Siphon the Power from a targeted foe, reducing their damage potential. The power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies. Recharge: Slow
Siphon_Power.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced.
Siphon_Power.display_attacker_hit: You reduced the damage potential of {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} to increase your own!
Siphon_Power.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage potential with {PowerName} to increase their own!

Siphon_Speed.display_help: You can Siphon the speed from a targeted foe, Slowing their movement and attack rate while boosting your own. Recharge: Long
Siphon_Speed.display_target_help: Your Running Speed potential has been altered. If this is a friendly power, your Running Speed is increased. If you were attacked with this power, though, your Running Speed is reduced.

Flares.display_help: You launch a small volley of flares at a single target, causing fire damage.

Fire_Blast.display_help: You launch a strong blast of fire at a target, causing fire damage. The target is set ablaze and suffers additional fire damage over time.
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Ball.display_help: You launch a fireball at a targeted foe. This fireball explodes on reaching the target. Anyone caught in the radius of the explosion is burned and set ablaze.
Fire_Ball.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DMG(Smashing/Fire), Moderate DoT(Fire)
Fire_Ball.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Dark_Blast.display_help: You unleash a long range blast of darkness that causes negative energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit.
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_help: You ensnare targets arrayed before you in a mass of tentacles pulled from the nether. These tentacles immobilize your foe and deal negative energy damage. The tentacles also continue to pummel your target, dealing smashing damage over time and reducing the target's chance to hit.
Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Minor DMG(Negative Energy), Moderate DoT(Smashing), Immobilize(Foe), -ToHit(Foe)
Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_target_help: You are immobilized and suffering smashing damage over time. Additionally, your chance to hit has been reduced.

Torrent.display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. The attack deals negative energy damage and sends foes flying, while also reducing their chance to hit.
Torrent.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Life_Drain.display_help: You channel hidden knowledge to drain some life energy from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that drained life energy is transferred to you.
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Gloom.display_help: You unleash a nebulous mass of darkness that slowly drains a target of life, causing negative energy damage over time and reducing their chance to hit.
Gloom.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and your chance to hit is reduced.

Summon_Demonlings.display_help: You summon demons to assist you in battle.

Summon_Demon_Prince.display_help: You summon a demon prince to assist you in battle.

Hell_on_Earth.display_help: You improve a demon pet's damage and chance to hit. The pet is also wreathed in Living Hellfire, which will occasionally create beings of fire to attack your enemies.

Forge.display_help: You significantly enhance a single ally's damage potential and chance to hit.
Forge.display_attacker_hit: You greatly increase the Damage and chance to hit of {PlayerDest}.
Forge.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your Damage and chance to hit.

Melt_Armor.display_help: You target a location and dramatically heat the air, melting any protections on targets caught within the area. Affected targets suffer reduced defense and resistance.
Melt_Armor.display_target_help: Your defense against and resistance to all types of damage has been reduced.
Melt_Armor.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Defense and Damage Resistance of {PlayerDest}.
Melt_Armor.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Defense and Damage Resistance.

Cauterize.display_help: You cauterize the wounds of a targeted ally, healing them.

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: You launch a bolt of electrical energy at your foe, causing energy damage and draining the target's endurance. The target also has a chance to suffer reduced recovery.
Lightning_Bolt.display_target_help: You are losing endurance. Your recovery may also be suppressed.

Ball_Lightning.display_help: You fire a highly charged ball of electrical energy that erupts on hitting its target. This deals energy damage over time to all affected targets and drains some of their endurance. Targets may also suffer from a reduced recovery rate.
Ball_Lightning.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, High DMG(Energy), High DoT (Energy), -End(Foe), Chance for -Rec(Foe)
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: You are suffering energy damage over time and are losing endurance. You may also be suffering from a suppressed recovery rate.

Jolting_Chain.display_help: You can send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, knocking each down and causing some energy damage. Affected targets also suffer endurance loss and may suffer suppressed recovery. The electric charge can jump to multiple opponents.
Jolting_Chain.display_short_help: Ranged (Chain), Moderate DMG (Energy), -End(Foe), Knockdown(Foe), Chance for -Rec(Foe)
Jolting_Chain.display_target_help: You are losing endurance. Your recovery may also be suppressed.

Damage_Fireball.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Fireball.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Damage_Cloud_of_Ice.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Cloud_of_Ice.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Damage_Lightning_Storm.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Lightning_Storm.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Damage_Ball_of_Light.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Ball_of_Light.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Damage_Animated_Staff.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Animated_Staff.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Damage_Forbidden_Knowledge.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Forbidden_Knowledge.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Damage_Crystal_Ball.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Crystal_Ball.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Damage_Time_Stop.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Time_Stop.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Damage_Vorpal_Sword.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Vorpal_Sword.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Damage_Gate.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Gate.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Damage_Dispel_Magic.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Dispel_Magic.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Damage_Counter_Spell.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Counter_Spell.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Damage_Ward.display_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.
Damage_Ward.display_target_help: The Animus Arcana have a variety of strengths and weaknesses, depending on their type.

Lift.display_help: You negate the force of gravity around your target, violently sending them into the air. This causes smashing damage when they fall to the ground.
Lift.display_target_help: You are unable to fly for a short time.

Time_Crawl.display_help: You dramatically slow time around a single enemy, reducing their movement speed and attack rate. Time is slowed to such an extreme that their wounds will take longer to heal, reducing their regeneration rate. Time Crawl applies the Delayed effect on its target. Debuff and control effects from other Time Manipulation powers are increased on targets affected by Delayed.
Time_Crawl.display_target_help: Your attack rate, movement speed and regeneration rate have been reduced. You are also affected by a persistent time slowdown.

Distortion_Field.display_help: You slow the flow of time in a targeted area. Enemies who enter the field will have their attack rate and speed slowed dramatically. In addition, affected enemies might become held as they are frozen in time.
Distortion_Field.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, -Rech(Foe), -Speed(Foe, All), Chance for Hold(Foe)
Distortion_Field.display_target_help: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced. You may also be held and unable to move.
Distortion_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduces your targets' Movement and Recharge Speed.

Time_Stop.display_help: You trap your target within the flow of time, causing them to be held helpless and to suffer from reduced effectiveness of regeneration and healing. The hold is more severe if the target is Delayed by Time Crawl.
Time_Stop.display_target_help: You are held and unable to move. Your regeneration rate and ability to be healed have been reduced.

Chrono_Shift.display_help: You cause nearby allies to act more quickly by allowing them to slip through the time stream seamlessly, allowing your allies to recover from battle and speed up their ability to fight back.

Propel.display_help: You open a gravitational rift and retrieve a heavy object. You then launch this object at your target, causing smashing damage on impact and knocking the target back.

Hack.display_help: You hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit.
Hack.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Slash.display_help: You perform a quick Slash that deals lethal damage and reduces a target's Defense, making him easier to hit.
Slash.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Spear_of_Light.display_help: You discharge a beam of energy, striking the target for energy damage.

Parry.display_help: You parry incoming attacks, dealing lethal damage. Additionally, you will increase your defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while.

Whirling_Sword.display_help: You whirl around in a circle, slicing all foes in melee range for lethal damage. This attack also wounds your opponents, causing them to take minor lethal damage over time and reducing their defense.
Whirling_Sword.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Moderate DoT(Lethal), -DEF(Foe, All)
Whirling_Sword.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced and you are suffering lethal damage over time.

Disembowel.display_help: You perform a powerful disemboweling maneuver that deals a great amount of damage and can knock a target up into the air. This attack also reduces a target's defense.
Disembowel.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Lethal), -DEF(Foe, All), Chance for Knockup(Foe)
Disembowel.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.

Head_Splitter.display_help: You perform a devastating Head Splitter attack that deals a massive amount of damage and reduces its Defense. The target may also be knocked to the ground.
Head_Splitter.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Lethal), -DEF(Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown
Head_Splitter.display_target_help: Your defense against all attacks has been reduced.
